nodes.title: Queue and Orchestration Tree
nodes.excerpt: Async job queues, schedulers, and orchestration services.
nodes.bodyMD:
This tree maps async job queues, orchestration services, and job routes for background processing.

Minimal artifact: queue and job flow map.

nodes.title: Queue Core
nodes.bodyMD:
Queue registry and dispatch (server/queue/index.ts).

Minimal artifact: queue handler map.

nodes.title: Queue Routes
nodes.excerpt: HTTP routes for job dispatch and status.
nodes.bodyMD:
Queue routes and job endpoints (server/routes/jobs.ts).

Minimal artifact: jobs route list.

nodes.title: Job Services
nodes.bodyMD:
Job services (server/services/jobs/engine.ts, server/services/jobs/payouts.ts, server/services/jobs/token-budget.ts, server/services/jobs/proposals.ts).

Minimal artifact: job service map.

nodes.title: Essence Ingest Jobs
nodes.bodyMD:
Essence ingest job wiring (server/services/essence/ingest-jobs.ts, server/queue/index.ts).

Minimal artifact: ingest job map.

nodes.title: Profile Summarizer
nodes.bodyMD:
Profile summarizer job (server/services/profile-summarizer-job.ts, server/services/profile-summarizer.ts).

Minimal artifact: summarizer job flow.

nodes.title: Orchestrator
nodes.bodyMD:
Orchestrator service and routes (server/services/orchestrator.ts, server/routes/orchestrator.ts).

Minimal artifact: orchestration flow.
